reviewText: The description of the item is not accurate.  The film is in Dutch and Italian only and I don't speak either language!  When I bought it I thought that even though the main audio was in a foreign language at least it was going to have English subtitles but nope, it didn't .  So, my advice is if you don't speak Dutch or Italian don't buy it.
This German dvd will not most likely play on your USA dvd player.

, it has to be an I think amazon shouuld make customers aware that not any oldDVD player can  be uesd for this DVd, it has to be an ALL REGIONS FREE player, because it is a Germab made DVD and cannot be played on a regular US DVD player.
